titulo: Strengthening the international dimension of ESFRI and/or ERIC research infrastructures
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to several of the following expected outcomes:New or enhanced, effective cooperation of European research infrastructures with key international partners;Strengthened position of European research infrastructures in the global research infrastructure landscape;Increased opportunities for the development of global research infrastructures, including proposals expanding the geographical coverage of ongoing collaborations;Increased capacit
